column5: Buddy i work with lost his wallet... credit cards / driver's licence / health card / social insurance card / citizenship card...  how does one go about replacing his citizenship card?  he's got to go to the states for a wedding in 2 weeks, so this is a major concern  any help would be appreciated...

OUCH!  I did the same thing in june last summer. Lost the whole works........plus my car keys with it!!  I have a funny feeling he won't have his paperwork back in 2 weeks, it took me a few months before I had everything in order.  Sinker
Try calling your local MP's office. Sometimes they can offer suggestions to expedite these things.  JF
